alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cassia County through 430 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Oakley Reservoir, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakley Reservoir, Oakley and Bostetter Ranger Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
